ch0336_00_mimoza/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I had a
feeling you might show up!
ch0336_00_mimoza/0101_0701_02_10:
I can patch up any small scrapes or injuries,
so go out there and do your best today!
ch0336_00_mimoza/7101_0701_01_10:
I just passed the health teacher certification
exam...
ch0336_00_mimoza/7101_0701_02_10:
But I still haven’t had many chances to stand
in front of a class.
ch0336_00_mimoza/7101_0701_03_10: I’m glad Pasio Academy had some openings!
ch0336_00_mimoza/7102_0701_01_10:
If you get hurt while exploring, come see
me. I’ll tend to your injuries!
ch0336_00_mimoza/7102_0701_02_10:
I’m used to it, thanks to my work at the
academy back in Paldea.
ch0336_00_mimoza/7102_0701_03_10:
I’d help take care of students, a teacher
who always went too hard, and another
who was kind of clumsy...
ch0336_00_mimoza/7102_0701_04_10:
Hm... I guess I took care of those two most
of the time.
ch0336_00_mimoza/7103_0701_01_10:
Everyone always calls me nicknames, like
“Mimi” or “the angel of the nurse’s office.”
ch0336_00_mimoza/7103_0701_02_10:
So I can’t help but smile when they call me
Ms. Miriam!
ch0336_00_mimoza/7104_0701_01_10:
At the academy in Paldea, lots of students
would come to the nurse’s office to cut class.
ch0336_00_mimoza/7104_0701_02_10:
It would’ve been better to go to class
properly, but they had their reasons.
ch0336_00_mimoza/7104_0701_03_10:
It’s important to have a safe space at school
where you can be alone.
ch0336_00_mimoza/7105_0701_01_10:
I’m excited to taste all the sweets here
on Pasio!
ch0336_00_mimoza/7105_0701_02_10:
A bunch are from other regions, and Pasio
has a specialty that’s PARTICULARLY good!
ch0336_00_mimoza/7105_0701_03_10:
If you like sweets, we should share shop
tips, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0336_00_mimoza/1701_0701_01_10:
Here, you can have this! I’m sure it’ll come
in handy!
ch0336_00_mimoza/1701_0702_01_10:
I know you always do your best, but don’t
work too hard out there! Rest is important,
too!
ch0336_00_mimoza/2501_0701_01_10:
Whenever I’m in a Pokémon Center, it really
takes me back...
ch0336_00_mimoza/2501_0701_02_10:
I used to go to one all the time...but not for
its services.
ch0336_00_mimoza/2501_0701_03_10:
Would you believe me if I told you I worked
at a Pokémon Center before becoming a
teacher?
ch0336_00_mimoza/2501_0702_01_10:
I guess I just like taking care of people and
Pokémon.
ch0336_00_mimoza/2501_0702_02_10:
Even after changing jobs, I still do roughly
the same thing.
ch0336_00_mimoza/2501_0702_03_10:
Mr. Jacq and the director said the same
happened to them!
ch0336_00_mimoza/2511_0701_01_10:
When we become adults, we tend to get a
little jaded...
ch0336_00_mimoza/2511_0701_02_10:
But sometimes it’s important to put your
whole heart into something, like you kids do.
ch0336_00_mimoza/2511_0701_03_10:
I used to think following your dreams was
stupid. But now, I guess it’s not so bad.
ch0336_00_mimoza/2511_0702_01_10:
Sometimes, just seeing someone give their all
is enough to nudge you in the right direction.
ch0336_00_mimoza/2511_0702_02_10: Giving something your all can be tough.
ch0336_00_mimoza/2511_0702_03_10:
But when you do your best, it encourages
others to be brave, too!
ch0336_00_mimoza/3001_0701_01_10:
I know mornings can be tough, but put your
health first. Get some sunlight and eat right!
ch0336_00_mimoza/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s great you’re full of energy, but take
care of yourself and try not to catch a cold!
ch0336_00_mimoza/3005_0701_01_10:
Seems you worked hard today. How about I
get you a super sweet reward to munch on?
